verses.text_plain: But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.
verses.verse_html: 1But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.

verses.text_plain: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.
verses.verse_html: 2When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.

tokens.text: with thee; and through the rivers

verses.text_plain: For I am the Lord thy God, the Holy One of Israel, thy Saviour: I gave Egypt for thy ransom, Ethiopia and Seba for thee.
verses.verse_html: 3For I am the Lord thy God, the Holy One of Israel, thy Saviour: I gave Egypt for thy ransom, Ethiopia and Seba for thee.

verses.text_plain: Since thou wast precious in my sight, thou hast been honourable, and I have loved thee: therefore will I give men for thee, and people for thy life.
verses.verse_html:
4Since thou wast precious in my sight, thou hast been honourable, and I have loved thee: therefore will I give men for thee, and people for thy life. ▼
▼ life: or, person

verses.text_plain: Fear not: for I am with thee: I will bring thy seed from the east, and gather thee from the west;
verses.verse_html: 5Fear not: for I am with thee: I will bring thy seed from the east, and gather thee from the west;

verses.text_plain: I will say to the north, Give up; and to the south, Keep not back: bring my sons from far, and my daughters from the ends of the earth;
verses.verse_html: 6I will say to the north, Give up; and to the south, Keep not back: bring my sons from far, and my daughters from the ends of the earth;

verses.text_plain: Even every one that is called by my name: for I have created him for my glory, I have formed him; yea, I have made him.
verses.verse_html: 7Even every one that is called by my name: for I have created him for my glory, I have formed him; yea, I have made him.

verses.text_plain: Bring forth the blind people that have eyes, and the deaf that have ears.
verses.verse_html: 8Bring forth the blind people that have eyes, and the deaf that have ears.

verses.text_plain: Let all the nations be gathered together, and let the people be assembled: who among them can declare this, and shew us former things? let them bring forth their witnesses, that they may be justified: or let them hear, and say, It is truth.
verses.verse_html: 9Let all the nations be gathered together, and let the people be assembled: who among them can declare this, and shew us former things? let them bring forth their witnesses, that they may be justified: or let them hear, and say, It is truth.

verses.text_plain: Ye are my witnesses, saith the Lord, and my servant whom I have chosen: that ye may know and believe me, and understand that I am he: before me there was no God formed, neither shall there be after me.
verses.verse_html:
10Ye are my witnesses, saith the Lord, and my servant whom I have chosen: that ye may know and believe me, and understand that I am he: before me there was no God formed, neither shall there be after me. ▼
▼ no…: or, nothing formed of God

footnotes.body_text: ▼ no…: or, nothing formed of God
footnotes.body_html: ▼ no…: or, nothing formed of God

verses.text_plain: I, even I, am the Lord; and beside me there is no saviour.
verses.verse_html: 11I, even I, am the Lord; and beside me there is no saviour.

verses.text_plain: I have declared, and have saved, and I have shewed, when there was no strange god among you: therefore ye are my witnesses, saith the Lord, that I am God.
verses.verse_html: 12I have declared, and have saved, and I have shewed, when there was no strange god among you: therefore ye are my witnesses, saith the Lord, that I am God.

verses.text_plain: Yea, before the day was I am he; and there is none that can deliver out of my hand: I will work, and who shall let it?
verses.verse_html:
13Yea, before the day was I am he; and there is none that can deliver out of my hand: I will work, and who shall let it? ▼
▼ let it: Heb. turn it back?

footnotes.body_text: ▼ let it: Heb. turn it back?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ let it: Heb. turn it back?

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord, your redeemer, the Holy One of Israel; For your sake I have sent to Babylon, and have brought down all their nobles, and the Chaldeans, whose cry is in the ships.
verses.verse_html:
14Thus saith the Lord, your redeemer, the Holy One of Israel; For your sake I have sent to Babylon, and have brought down all their nobles, and the Chaldeans, whose cry is in the ships. ▼
▼ nobles: Heb. bars

tokens.text: For your sake I have sent

verses.text_plain: I am the Lord, your Holy One, the creator of Israel, your King.
verses.verse_html: 15I am the Lord, your Holy One, the creator of Israel, your King.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord, which maketh a way in the sea, and a path in the mighty waters;
verses.verse_html: 16Thus saith the Lord, which maketh a way in the sea, and a path in the mighty waters;

verses.text_plain: Which bringeth forth the chariot and horse, the army and the power; they shall lie down together, they shall not rise: they are extinct, they are quenched as tow.
verses.verse_html: 17Which bringeth forth the chariot and horse, the army and the power; they shall lie down together, they shall not rise: they are extinct, they are quenched as tow.

verses.text_plain: Remember ye not the former things, neither consider the things of old.
verses.verse_html: 18Remember ye not the former things, neither consider the things of old.

verses.text_plain: Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.
verses.verse_html: 19Behold, I will do a new thing; now it shall spring forth; shall ye not know it? I will even make a way in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert.

verses.text_plain: The beast of the field shall honour me, the dragons and the owls: because I give waters in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert, to give drink to my people, my chosen.
verses.verse_html:
20The beast of the field shall honour me, the dragons and the owls: because I give waters in the wilderness, and rivers in the desert, to give drink to my people, my chosen. ▼
▼ owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl

footnotes.body_text: ▼ owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl
footnotes.body_html: ▼ owls: or, ostriches: Heb. daughters of the owl

verses.text_plain: This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.
verses.verse_html: 21This people have I formed for myself; they shall shew forth my praise.

tokens.text: for myself; they shall shew forth

verses.text_plain: But thou hast not called upon me, O Jacob; but thou hast been weary of me, O Israel.
verses.verse_html: 22But thou hast not called upon me, O Jacob; but thou hast been weary of me, O Israel.

verses.text_plain: Thou hast not brought me the small cattle of thy burnt offerings; neither hast thou honoured me with thy sacrifices. I have not caused thee to serve with an offering, nor wearied thee with incense.
verses.verse_html:
23Thou hast not brought me the small cattle of thy burnt offerings; neither hast thou honoured me with thy sacrifices. I have not caused thee to serve with an offering, nor wearied thee with incense. ▼
▼ small…: Heb. lambs, or, kids

tokens.text: I have not caused thee to serve

footnotes.body_html: ▼ small…: Heb. lambs, or, kids

verses.text_plain: Thou hast bought me no sweet cane with money, neither hast thou filled me with the fat of thy sacrifices: but thou hast made me to serve with thy sins, thou hast wearied me with thine iniquities.
verses.verse_html:
24Thou hast bought me no sweet cane with money, neither hast thou filled me with the fat of thy sacrifices: but thou hast made me to serve with thy sins, thou hast wearied me with thine iniquities. ▼
▼ filled…: Heb. made me drunk, or, abundantly moistened

tokens.text: but thou hast made me to serve

footnotes.body_text: ▼ filled…: Heb. made me drunk, or, abundantly moistened
footnotes.body_html: ▼ filled…: Heb. made me drunk, or, abundantly moistened

verses.text_plain: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.
verses.verse_html: 25I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

tokens.text: for mine own sake, and will not remember

verses.text_plain: Put me in remembrance: let us plead together: declare thou, that thou mayest be justified.
verses.verse_html: 26Put me in remembrance: let us plead together: declare thou, that thou mayest be justified.

tokens.text: thou, that thou mayest be justified

verses.text_plain: Thy first father hath sinned, and thy teachers have transgressed against me.
verses.verse_html:
27Thy first father hath sinned, and thy teachers have transgressed against me. ▼
▼ teachers: Heb. interpreters

verses.text_plain: Therefore I have profaned the princes of the sanctuary, and have given Jacob to the curse, and Israel to reproaches.
verses.verse_html:
28Therefore I have profaned the princes of the sanctuary, and have given Jacob to the curse, and Israel to reproaches. ▼
▼ princes…: or, holy princes

footnotes.body_html: ▼ princes…: or, holy princes
